  • Method Details

    • decryptAES

      public static byte[] decryptAES​(byte[] encryptedData, int length, javax.crypto.SecretKey key)
      Returns a byte array containing the decrypted data
      Parameters:
      encryptedData - byte array of the encrypted data
      length - how many bytes in the array to decrypt from position 0
      key - the SecretKey that will be used to decrypt
      Returns:
      byte array containing the decrypted data
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if the key is invalid

    • encryptAES

      public static byte[] encryptAES​(byte[] data, int length, javax.crypto.SecretKey key)
      Returns a byte array containing the encrypted data
      Parameters:
      data - byte array of the data to encrypt
      length - how many bytes in the array to encrypt from position 0
      key - the SecretKey to use to encrypt
      Returns:
      byte array
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if the key is invalid

    • decryptRSA

      public static byte[] decryptRSA​(byte[] data, int length, java.security.PrivateKey key)
      Returns a byte array containing the decrypted data
      Parameters:
      data - byte array of the data to decrypt
      length - how many bytes in the array to decrypt from position 0
      key - the PrivateKey to use to decrypt
      Returns:
      byte array
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if the key is invalid

    • encryptRSA

      public static byte[] encryptRSA​(byte[] data, int length, java.security.PublicKey key)
      Returns a byte array containing the encrypted data
      Parameters:
      data - byte array of the data to encrypt
      length - how many bytes in the array to encrypt from position 0
      key - the PublicKey to use to encrypt
      Returns:
      byte array
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if the key is invalid

    • createRSA

      public static void createRSA() throws java.io.IOException
      Creates a new private-public keypair of type RSA
      Throws:
      java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the generator doesn't recognize the encryption algorithm
      java.io.IOException - if the saveRSA method fails to save the keys

    • saveRSA

      public static void saveRSA​(java.security.PublicKey pub, java.security.PrivateKey pvt)
      Saves a public and a private key to two different files
      Parameters:
      pub - the public key
      pvt - the private key
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if it fails to save to file

    • loadRSAPrivateKey

      public static java.security.PrivateKey loadRSAPrivateKey​(java.lang.String filePath)
      Loads an RSA private key from file
      Returns:
      PrivateKey

    • loadRSAPublicKey

      public static java.security.PublicKey loadRSAPublicKey​(java.lang.String filePath)
      Loads an RSA public key from file
      Returns:
      PublicKey

    • cleanUp

      public static boolean cleanUp​(java.io.File file)
      Deletes the generated public- and private key files with its folder
      Parameters:
      file - the File with the path to the directory of the public and private keys
      Returns:
      true if files and folders are deleted successfully, otherwise false
